Package org.mortbay.jetty.deployer

Interface Summary
ConfigurationManager ConfigurationManager Type for allow injection of property values for replacement in jetty xml files during deployment.
 

Class Summary
ContextDeployer Context Deployer This deployer scans a designated directory by ContextDeployer.setConfigurationDir(String) for the appearance/disappearance or changes to xml configuration files.
FileConfigurationManager FileConfigurationManager Supplies properties defined in a file.
WebAppDeployer Web Application Deployer.
